column2: Williams files suit to prevent Energy Transfer from terminating deal May 13 Williams Companies Inc said it has filed a lawsuit against Energy Transfer Equity LP to prevent it from terminating its once-coveted deal for Williams. ~BRIEF-Williams files lawsuit seeking to prevent ETE from avoiding its obligations under merger agreement * Williams files lawsuit seeking to prevent ETE from avoiding its obligations under merger agreement ~
